availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Burkhamer (George Burkheimer) (Cincinnati, Hamilton County, Ohio, steam boat captain.)

body.p: Cincinnati, Hamilton County, Ohio, steam boat captain. Pennsylvania native. Married to Mary Burkhamer. Father of Ella Burkhamer. Carpenter in Cincinnati, Hamilton County, Ohio, in 1850. Steamboat captain in Cincinnati in 1860. Fugitive from justice in Louisiana in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati Ward 8, p. 559B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati Ward 15, p. 318.
KYR-0001-006-0036.
